tuv.seg: Financial institutions and identification
Institiúidí airgeadais agus aitheantas
Before you open an account with a financial institution, they are obliged to establish your identity and verify your address
Sular féidir leat cuntas a oscailt le hinstitiúid airgeadais, tá dualgas orthu d’aitheantas a dheimhniú agus do sheoladh a dheimhniú
This requirement is set down in anti-money laundering legislation
Tá an dualgas seo leagtha amach sa reachtaíocht frithsciúrtha airgid
Financial institutions include banks, building societies and credit unions
Áirítear le hinstitiúidí airgeadais bainc, cumainn foirgníochta agus comhair chreidmheasa
When you are opening an account you cannot use the same document as proof of both your identity and your address
Nuair a bhíonn cuntas á oscailt agat, ní féidir leat an cháipéis chéanna a úsáid mar chruthúnas i leith d’aitheantais agus do sheolta
The requirements set out here are minimum requirements and the bank can look for further information
Riachtanais íosta iad na ceanglais a leagtar amach anseo agus is féidir leis an mbanc níos mó faisnéise a lorg
You can prove your identity with any of the following:
Féadfaidh tú d’aitheantas a chruthú le haon cheann de na nithe seo a leanas:
• A current Irish driving licence
• Ceadúnas tiomána Éireannach bailí
• A National Age Card (issued by An Garda Síochána)
• Aoischárta Náisiúnta (arna eisiúint ag an nGarda Síochána)
• An identification form with a photograph signed by a member of An Garda Síochána
• Foirm aitheantais le grianghraf atá sínithe ag ball den Gharda Síochána
• Documents issued by government departments showing your name
• Doiciméid arna n-eisiúint ag ranna rialtais a thaispeánann d’ainm
Government documents must be verified by a statement from a person in a position of responsibility such as a solicitor, accountant, doctor or social worker
Ní mór doiciméid Rialtais a bheith dearbhaithe ag ráiteas ó dhuine i bpost freagrachta cosúil le aturnae, cuntasóir, dochtúir nó oibrí sóisialta
That person must also come to the bank themselves with proof of their own identity
Ní mór don duine sin teacht chuig an mbanc iad féin le cruthúnas dá n-aitheantas féin
You can provide evidence of your address with any of these documents:
Féadfaidh tú fianaise a chur ar fáil i leith do sheolta le haon cheann de na cáipéisí seo a leanas:
• A current utility bill (such as a gas, electricity or telephone or mobile phone bill)
• Bille fóntais reatha (cosúil le bille gáis, leictreachais nó teileafóin nó teileafóin phóca)
• A current car or home insurance policy that shows your address
• Polasaí árachais baile nó cairr reatha a thaispeánann do sheoladh
• A document issued by a government department that shows your address
• Doiciméad a d’eisigh roinn Rialtais a thaispeánann do sheoladh
• A list of your tax credits
• Liosta de do chreidmheasanna cánach
• A current balancing statement from Revenue
• Ráiteas comhardaithe reatha ó na gCoimisinéirí Ioncaim
• A social insurance document (that shows your address)
• Doiciméad árachais shóisialta a thaispeánann do sheoladh

• A letter from your employer or licensed employment agency stating that you have recently arrived in Ireland and have started work but cannot yet provide evidence of your Irish address (you will have to provide evidence of your address at a later date)

• Litir ó d’fhostóir nó ó ghníomhaireacht fostaíochta ceadaithe ag rá gur tháinig tú go hÉirinn le déanaí agus gur thosaigh tú ag obair ach nach féidir leat fianaise de do sheoladh Éireannach a chur ar fáil fós (beidh ort fianaise de do sheoladh a chur ar fáil ag dáta níos déanaí)
In some cases a bank may ask you for your PPS number – for example, if you are claiming tax relief on the interest paid on a mortgage loan
I roinnt cásanna, d’fhéadfadh banc iarraidh ort d’uimhir PSP a sholáthar – mar shampla, má bhíonn faoiseamh cánach á éileamh agat ar ús a íocadh ar iasacht mhorgáiste
Copies of all documentation used to establish the identity of the customer must be retained for 5 years after an account is closed
Ní foláir cóipeanna de na cáipéisí uilig a úsáideadh chun a dhearbhú cérbh é an custaiméir a choinneáil le haghaidh 5 bliana tar éis dó/di an cuntas a dhúnadh
Also, copies of transactions must be kept for 5 years after the date of the transaction
Ní foláir, chomh maith, cóipeanna de bhearta a choinneáil le haghaidh 5 bliana tar éis an dáta gur cuireadh an beart i gcrích
Bank staff are required to know the nature of their customers' business and can ask for information about the level and type of business that is likely to be transacted through the account
Tá sé riachtanach d'fhoireann an bhainc eolas a bheith acu ar an gcineál gnó atá ag a gcustaiméirí agus is féidir leo eolas a iarraidh ar an méid agus cineál gnó a bhéas ag dul tríd an gcuntas
You can also be asked to provide confirmation of the source of your funds and to give reasons for carrying out certain transactions
D'fhéadfaí iarraidh ar chustaiméirí foinse a gciste a dhearbhú agus cúiseanna a thabhairt faoin fáth a ndéantar bearta áirithe
You should contact your bank or financial institution to get full details of the identification they require
Chun sonraí a fháil ar na foirmeacha aitheantais atá inghlactha, téigh i dteagmháil le do bhanc nó institiúid airgeadais
The Central Bank of Ireland’s Registers contains individual registers for all financial institutions regulated by the Central Bank of Ireland
Cuimsítear i gCláir Bhanc Ceannais na hÉireann cláir aonair le haghaidh gach institiúid airgeadais a rialaíonn Banc Ceannais na hÉireann
